title: Azir R Bug
body:
Why is it Azir that always has bugs? 

Okay, so I was playing a game of ARAM as Azir. There was a Xin Zhao on the other team and every time I used my wall to back him off me, he was able to dash over my wall to kill me. However, Azir's ult description specifically says it stops all forms of dashes. HE EVEN SNOWBALLED OVER IT! Anyone else having this issue? Please fix. It was awful.{{champion:268}}

replies.body: {{summoner:32}}  is untargetable when you dash so it ignores everything.
^ Azir's R does not effect untargetable units. This is working as intended.

Speaking of funny snowball interactions, yasuo's windwall seems to be able to stop the second activation, is that intended? I.e., i hit yasuo, he windwalls, i reactivate the snoball to jump on him but stop at the wall

i remember that veigar cage seems to stop the dash as well, even though you are "untargetable" I haven't come across it in a long time though so i don't know if it still causes problem but i know it did.
I can overlook the snowball but I'm more concerned with Xin just being able to dash over the ult whenever he wants
